articles.title: EFL Cup: Nine games including Newcastle v Man City & Chelsea v Brighton
articles.description: Follow 5 Live commentary, score & text updates from round three of the Carabao Cup as Newcastle host Man City plus eight other fixtures.
articles.content:
Last night seven teams booked their place in the Carabao Cup fourth round and tonight nine more will join them.
Then we'll have the draw.
All right, let's start building up then.
